column4: Is there any command to set install start at 1024*768@60hz ? Becouse when i try instal ubuntu, its starts normal (under dos, 640x480 etc.) then when loading ends i getting "out of sync" error from monitor.

Is there any command to set install start at 1024*768@60hz ? Becouse when i try instal ubuntu, its starts normal (under dos, 640x480 etc.) then when loading ends i getting "out of sync" error from monitor. (I'm using HD4850)
use the alternative install CD (text based)
i am very new on ubuntu and i dont know ubuntu much yet. How can i install ubuntu under text based ?
